alston.minecraft

Class BlockItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • alston.minecraft.Item
      • alston.minecraft.BlockItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable

    public class BlockItem
extends Item
    An extension the abstract class Item, and is for any Items that will become a block when right clicked. It defines the specific interactions that happens when the user rigth clicks with this item
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlockItem

        public BlockItem(com.jme3.ui.Picture picture,
         int type,
         float timeToBreak)
        Constructor for the blockItem, with the default 64 maxAmount per stack. Calls it's superclass constructor then assigns the additional variable of the time to break the block.
        Parameters:
        picture - The icon for the GUI
        type - An integer representation of the item.
        timeToBreak - A float representing the time in seconds it would take to break the block

      • BlockItem

        public BlockItem(com.jme3.ui.Picture picture,
         int type,
         float timeToBreak,
         int maxAmount)
        Constructor for the blockItem, with a predefined maxAmount. Calls it's superclass constructor then assigns the additional variable of the time to break the block.
        Parameters:
        picture - The picture for the GUI
        type - An integer representation of the item.
        timeToBreak - A float representing the time in seconds it would take to break the block
        maxAmount - The maximum amount of Items per stack

      • rightClick

        public void rightClick(int x,
              int y,
              int z,
              int xModifier,
              int yModifier,
              int zModifier)
        Description copied from class: Item
        Defines what happens when the player right clicks with this
        Specified by:
        rightClick in class Item
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the block that was clicked on
        y - The y coordinate of the block that was clicked on
        z - The z coordinate of the block that was clicked on
        xModifier - The face in the X axis the block was clicked on
        yModifier - The face in the Y axis the block was clicked on
        zModifier - The face in the Z axis the block was clicked on
